### Hello there!!!

I'm a graduate student in the Human Genetics PhD program at the Johns Hopkins University School of Medicine. I study noncoding regulatory variation in neuropsychiatric and neurodegenerative diseases such as Schizophrenia and Parkinkson Disease.

#### Education
- M.S. Clinical Research, University of Virginia, 2020
- B.S. Biomedical Engineering, University of Virginia, 2017
